text: A youth, S. Muthiah (20) was killed and five others sustained injuries when the car in which they were travelling hit a roadside tree at Veerapanjan near here on Sunday night. The police said that the youths were coming to the city from Rajakkoor when the driver, Joseph, is said to have lost control of the vehicle and hit a roadside tamarind tree around 11 p.m. All the injured were rushed to the Government Rajaji hospital, where Muthiah succumbed. The Karuppayoorani police are investigating.
title: One killed, five injured in accident
